content: I need to represent Medi-Span's dispensable drug id (DDID) can I just use https://www.wolterskluwercdi.com/? Are there additional steps that need to be taken besides including this in the capability statement?

Best asked on the #terminology channel.
In general, the owner of a code system gets to determine its URI, and https://www.wolterskluwercdi.com/ does not look like a very good URI for that code system.
Agree with Michael about the suggested url and asking the question on terminology. It would be good to get a url from Wolters Kluwer, if possible. But, if not, we can assign one.
@Rob Hausam just found the emails you and I with Walters Klower had about this back in 2017 - can you find them and dig it up and move it along?
Yes, that did sound familiar. OK, will pull those up and see about getting it moving.

As recommended moved topic to #terminology
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179202-terminology/topic/Code.20system.20for.20Medi-Span
